document_data.name: River Ma'at
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Ma'at''' was a wide, slow-moving body of water that twisted through much of the [[Outlands]].

Geography.Flora & Fauna: It was quite common to come across [[crocodile]]s and crocodile-like creatures living within the River Ma'at.

document_data.History: During the reign of King [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]], a [[half-elven]] [[paladin]] of [[Oghma]] from [[Cormyr]] was dispatched on a mission to explore the [[planes of existence]] beyond [[Toril]]. The paladin's name was [[Ambran|Ambran the Seeker]], and excerpts from his journal still survived to the [[Present Age]]. In volume 7, Ambran described how he hired a [[bariaur]] guide named [[Glin]] to take him from [[Sigil]] to the Outlands. Then Volume 9 told of his journey from Ribcage to Automata. Once there, he was able to witness the [[Great Modron March|Modron Parade]] before continuing on to the River Ma'at, accompanied by both Glin and [[Rialiva]], a member of the [[Doomguard]].<ref>{{Cite dragon/204/The Plane Truth Part II: A Journey to the Outlands|31}}
